subject: Re: [junit] running out of memory
msgSnippet: ... I don t think it s DOM-specific, although DOM is indeed a hungry beast. As you build up your test coverage, you are bound to hit a memory limit at some
messageBody:
On 1/20/06, David Saff <saff@...> wrote:
>
>
> I wonder if this was a JUnit issue, or just manipulation of incredibly
> huge DOM objects. It might have been both. Anyone out there with more
> insight into this particular project? Thanks,


I don't think it's DOM-specific, although DOM is indeed a hungry beast.

As you build up your test coverage, you are bound to hit a memory limit at
some point and keeping all these classes in memory at the same time is a
waste.

--
Cédric
http://testng.org


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
